description:
Embird Embroidery Software: Continues line quilting blocks

In this Course "Embird Embroidery Software: Continues line quilting blocks" we will create a Quilt design for machine embroidery with Embird Embroidery Digitizing Software. Digitize an embroidery design in Outline stitch with Embird.

Embird Embroidery Software: Continues line quilting blocks

Embird Studio allows easy and fast creation of Quilt Designs and other designs from photos or without photos.

Student does not import a photo into the background of the working area and then draws free hand objects in the Digitizing Tools.

Special controls and paramaters are available to tune density and colors.

Additional features like openings, carvings and color mask can be applied to achieve required stitch layout and texture.

This course is for Embird Embroidery Digitizing Software Digitizers who has a fair to good knowledge of their Embird Embroidery Digitizing Software.

We will only focus on working with Embird Studio

  • how to apply parameters to get the best results from your design
  • we teaches the use of different color
  • the use of parameters inside Studio Stitch
  • How to achieve an end result that will be a joy to stitch

The complete Course consist of over 53 minutes of video material broken down in 10 classes of 5+ minutes each to learn and apply to your Quilt designs.
title: Embird Embroidery Software: Continues line quilting blocks
